html:
7.26.22  8:55 pm   Is long long long journey about an artist trying to find a medium that suits him?

     the second verse goes there

     Idk that's just what I've always gotten from it

7.26.22  8:23 pm   could you please identify your favourite element to ingest? mine is one way stairs

      all the individual elements are fairly bland

7.26.22  7:00 pm   Are you a huge gamer most of the time?

     no

      Or does that only apply to the person in the video?

      it applies to many of the folks out there tonight

7.26.22  6:55 pm   How would you describe that feeling when you're on a plane and it's taking off, and the moment the wheel lift off of the ground? How does your head feel?

      floaty?

7.26.22  6:51 pm   whats the difference between a verse and a bridge

      any

7.26.22  6:10 pm   Man. I went to a music festival recently and was walking around, checking out the different stages and I just couldn't help thinking,  "is it normal to sound this bad?" Like it's so loud it sounds fuzzy, you can only hear parts of it/certain frequencies. A lot of the time the singers were out of breath and off pitch (I know I probably shouldn't judge there, it was super hot out and they were probably exhausted at a festival) but still...it just sounded really bad and everyone was rocking out like it was great. It's just...is that normal???? Am I the only one thinking this??,

      maybe the audience is just really excited to hear bass frequencies, because they've never heard it before on their device

7.26.22  5:26 pm   How do you come up with all those crazy great harmonies?

      many years of playing the keyboard has given me an intuition about how to do it

7.26.22  4:30 pm   how do you feel about the word 'static'

      sounds latin

7.26.22  3:56 pm   Thoughts on rectangular pizza?

      when serving slices, the number of crust edges on a slice comes into play

7.26.22  1:48 pm   whats your favorite knock knock joke?

      knocking on the other side of the door, just as the person arrives

7.26.22  1:23 pm   Has anyone ever asked you a trick question?

      yes. the average question is a trick question

7.26.22  1:01 pm   i need help

      ok, i'm on my way

7.26.22  12:16 pm   What's a good rhyming word pair?

      pair/pear

7.26.22  10:20 am   For how long should I heat my porridge

      how about cooling the porridge instead

7.26.22  9:42 am   can a Halloween music be funny and not scary? 

      sure

7.26.22  6:09 am   will your next song have a misspelled word or a peculiar word in it?

      there are some interestingly pronounced words

7.26.22  3:39 am   A common reccuring theme in my dreams is my in a public space suddenly screaming for no reason until i wake up. What does it mean

      it probably means it's time for you to start a podcast

7.26.22  2:12 am   i'm trying to learn about intervals and scales but i do not enjoy it at all, and it is not making sense to me no matter how hard i try, can i still make music without it

      maybe. give it a try. what you can also do, is make music using those things but not thinking about them. actually most music is certainly made without thinking about those things. like you were probably not thinking about grammar structure when writing your question. but i guess that raises the question of how did you learn to talk

7.25.22  11:57 pm   Why are exit signs green? EMergency exit signs, I should sa

      because green is supposed to be a nice color, making you want to go towards it, in an emergency. away from the.... red, which is the color of most emergencies

7.25.22  10:35 pm   Okay, no balderdash, but what about using the word sundry?

      seems like a good idea

7.25.22  10:09 pm   I feel like whenever I try to make music it sounds very bad. Very unmusical. This is a problem because I dislike making unmusical music and do not want to subject others to this misery, or embarrass myself in the process. I am looking for a solution and thought you could be of assistance.

      how about this: try to make it sound even less musical. music loves this kind of reverse psychology

7.25.22  8:54 pm   listen bill a lot of us are fairly sure you have some form of synesthesia. So. Do you?

      no

7.25.22  7:51 pm   what qualifies you for this position over other candidates?

      i'm crazy

7.25.22  7:25 pm   why are commas important

      they are a small stepping stone, in case you can't make it across the whole sentence in one leap

7.25.22  7:14 pm   you've made songs about airports, stores, and schools. can you please make one about hospitals?

      that sounds like a pretty cool idea, but unfortunately something about my personality makes me prefer not to take other people's suggestions

7.25.22  5:59 pm   what phobias seem scary at first but are actually very nice?

      agreeing to all the cookies

7.25.22  4:55 pm   Is music ok? Or is it not ok?

      worse. it's fantastic

7.25.22  4:38 pm   all of these scales you use for the background runs in your songs, did you learn them or just figure them out naturally?

      it's natural, like the musical version of drawing

7.25.22  3:01 pm   is it odd doing all those actions infront of the camera that are given more context in editing?

      it's one of the normalest parts of my life

7.25.22  2:10 pm   do you like coins

      only the really huge ones

7.25.22  12:26 pm   you say to try some of the keys of ther keyboard out but how am i supposed to know which ones combined radiate The Good Chemical???

     it's your personality which is going to determine which things count towards good or bad at any particular time

      trial and error? that would take a loong time.

     no longer than learning a language of speech and words

7.25.22  11:17 am   will 2023 be the year you release the hit song "2020 can kiss my ass"?

      no

7.25.22  10:03 am   Who let the dogs out?

      who imprisoned them in the first place

7.25.22  8:10 am   if there is an program called garageband why isnt there a program called atticband?

      why isn't there everything called everything. well, i'm pleased to announce, there is

7.25.22  5:51 am   How do i eat a sandwich 

      it's too complicated to explain

7.25.22  3:37 am   did notebook entry 3.2.20 9:09 pm inspire the intro to  "i'm a huge gamer most of the time"

     they're both inspired by the same thing, which is the desire to merge song and scene

7.25.22  3:03 am   how do i get back the spark someone took from me

      make a better one

7.25.22  12:11 am   What color is love?

      any

7.24.22  11:29 pm   your "porridge heated for the wrong time" post on instagram has exactly 9,999 likes and the number on the microwave is 99,999

      fair enough

7.24.22  10:05 pm   Do you believe in a language of symbols that lies one layer elsewhere of every language/languager

      it's sort of a gradient, i suppose

7.24.22  9:30 pm   its crazy how context can completely change the feeligns towards a song

      that's true

7.24.22  9:18 pm   hey bill what should i build on my friend's minecraft server

      how about another minecraft server

7.24.22  7:31 pm   What's one thing you would never make a song about?

      any answer to this immediately becomes a very appealing song topic. that's just the mischievous nature of songs

7.24.22  4:19 pm   can one learn to write songs?

      yes. part of this is making up your own way to do it

7.24.22  3:31 pm   right now i'm in a small rut. how do i get out

      try going slightly backwards for a moment

7.24.22  3:21 pm   what if backwards watermelon?

      watermelons seem mostly symmetrical to me

7.24.22  3:17 pm   do you have a favorite song that you wrote or will they get too jealous if you answer?

      i would prefer to write a new one to be my favorite

7.24.22  2:30 pm   Can you include the word "balderdash" in your next song? 

      i shall not. i'm sorry about this

7.24.22  1:40 pm   How many distinct characters do you have in your videos?

     i'm not sure

     Do they have names?

     sometimes

7.24.22  12:37 pm   What is your opinion on the word yes

      i like it very much
